long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Communicate on WhatsApp at scale without WhatsApp API

Vepaar Extension works on top of Web WhatsApp, without needing the WhatsApp API. It enables quick replies, conversation saving, ticket management, reminders, and scheduling. It integrates HubSpot, Salesforce, and Google Calendar within WhatsApp Web, reducing turnaround times. 

Get more productive with Vepaar: 
‚û° Add Contacts and send WhatsApp messages to unsaved numbers within web WhatsApp
‚û° Create templates and send quick personalized replies
‚û° Pre-built tabs that auto-update according to the message‚Äôs status, such as Unread, Open, Closed, Followup, Contacts, Unknown, Groups & Businesses
‚û° Save messages and media
‚û° Create sales funnel and tags
‚û° AutoSync and download WhatsApp chats
‚û° Set Reminders
‚û° Build Customer Profile
‚û° Ticket & Activity Notes Management
‚û° Bulk Import/Export
‚û° HubSpot & Salesforce Integration
